ProjectileStats.name: Standard
ProjectileStats.description: The Standard Projectile will explode on impact with any object.

ProjectileStats.name: Airburst
ProjectileStats.description: The Airburst Projectile will explode when it is 10 metres above any object. Players should take extra care when planning trajectories!

ProjectileStats.name: Bouncing
ProjectileStats.description: The bouncing bomb can be detonated at any point after first contact with an object by the player. It will bounce considerable more than any of the other projectile types.

ProjectileStats.name: Cluster
ProjectileStats.description: The Cluster Projectile has the ability to deploy a large number of smaller projectiles at any time. This can be used to affect a large area with smaller explosions.

ProjectileStats.name: Homing
ProjectileStats.description: The Homing Projectile will head towards the proedicted impact location after it has been armed. The Projectile will take 5 seconds to arm itself after it has been fired.

ProjectileStats.name: Gravity
ProjectileStats.description: The Gravity Projectile will reverse the effect of gravity within a radius around the projectile. Any debris or loose objects will be catapulted into the air.

ProjectileStats.name: Singularity
ProjectileStats.description: The Singularity Projectile creates a small blackhole on impact. The blackhole will attract objects around it and will grow larger when an object enters the Event Horizon.

ProjectileStats.name: Nuke
ProjectileStats.description: The Nuke has the ability to devestate large areas which a single blast. It explodes on impact with any object and vapourises most within the blast radius.
